org.lafayette.server.domain.mapper
Class BaseMapper<T extends DomainObject>

java.lang.Object
  org.lafayette.server.domain.mapper.BaseMapper<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of mapped domain object
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mapper<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RoleMapper, UserMapper
abstract class BaseMapper<T extends DomainObject>
extends Object
implements Mapper<T>

Base implementation for database mappers.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

Field Detail

LOG

private static final Logger LOG
Logging facility.

SQL_FIND_BY_ID

private static final String SQL_FIND_BY_ID
Generic find by id query. First format parameter are the colum names. Second format parameter is he table tableMame. Third format parameter is the primary key field tableMame. First prepared statement parameter is the id.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SQL_FIND_ALL

private static final String SQL_FIND_ALL
Generic find all query. First format parameter are the colum names. Second format parameter is he table tableMame. Third format parameter is the limit. Fourth format parameter is the offset.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SQL_MAX_PK

private static final String SQL_MAX_PK
Generic query to find the maximum id used. First format parameter is the primary key field tableMame. Second format parameter is the table tableMame.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SQL_DELETE

private static final String SQL_DELETE
Generic query to delete by id. First format parameter is the table tableMame. Second format parameter is the primary key field tableMame. First prepared statement parameter is the id.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

dataSource

private final DataSource dataSource
Manages database connections.

idMap

private final IntegerIdentityMap<T extends DomainObject> idMap
Caches domain object loaded from database in memory. Key is the primary key of the domain object.

description

private final TableDescription description
Describes the mapped table.

doLoad

protected abstract T doLoad(int id,
                            ResultSet result)
                                          throws SQLException
Mapper specific implementation for creating a domain object from result set.

Parameters:
id - identity of domain object
result - data source
Returns:
may return null if no results in result set
Throws:
SQLException - if any SQL error occurs
